speaker: President. –
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0021/2006 ) by Mrs Edit Herczog, on behalf of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on the effects of globalisation on the internal market ( 2004/2225(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0021/2006 ) by Mrs Edit Herczog, on behalf of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on the effects of globalisation on the internal market ( 2004/2225(INI) ).
